title: Unabel to connect to server
body:
After Champion Select (in every Gamemode) when normaly the game beginn to load and you can see the Matchup -  I get the message "Unable to connect to Server" I googeld it and tried to fix it by myself. But useless. I checked Firewall, AntiVir, Graphic Drivers, Net Framework, i deinstalled and installed the Game twice. Nothing worked. Now im very sad :/ and dont know what to try else. Some of my friends can still Play. So this is not a Problem that matters to all.
Ah and by the way im EU West. I will try NA maybe this helps. BUT PLS RIOT FIX YOUR SERVER/CLIENT PROBS!

Update: I tried NA Server and it worked. Seems to be a EU Problem!

replies.body: Dude i test the hole Connection guide nothing works. And when u think about it why before the patch all went good? And now ist broken... and when its my fault why i can Play on NA? Think about that pls.

It doesn't look like we've had any EUW servers issues today, and if your friends were still able to play then that means this is probably more of a connection issue. Since you've already taken some general troubleshooting steps, that helps narrow things down a bit for me! 

It doesn't look like you've tried updating your port forwarding settings or DNS server settings, so check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for how you can do that and let me know how it goes.
